comments.body: I'm personally left handed and play with left handed mode on java so when going in between versions it's just feels off.
I want it in bedrock so badly bro
2025 and still waiting for left handed mode on Bedrock Edition. :(
It’d be amazing to have this feature, I’ve been wanting it for accessibility, and also plainly because I think it looks better for me
Please let Bedrock Players too, use their left Hand.
Left hand plsss in bedrock this is why bedrock have mod left hand so much minecraft pls added left hand accessibility everyone want left hand so much bro pls added
We need to make a campaign and popularize this idea and brings attention
This need to happen but since bedrock is very buggy I’m not to sure if it’s a great idea

I’ve always wanted to crawl in Minecraft bedrock so this idea will change everything
This would be so cool if us bedrock players could play hardcore for free!!!
They won't add in any natural disasters, events have to be player-based only.
Minecraft already said no to that because they do not want to add any unpreventable natural disasters that can break/ruin the players buildings in anyway
But it makes more thrill than ever
^Then use mods/add-ons that have tornadoes. It is not for the base game.
I don't gonna get more falling down with the fall damage

Hello, this appears to be a non-English post. Below you will find a transcription of the topic being discussed.   

Title: “Iron Golems”   

Text: “I wish they added in the next update that the iron golem could be cured with minecraft bedrock iron ingots.”  

- Translated by Admin
Si eso sería una muy buena idea
wat is golems lingot hmmm your mi at
wat is golems lingot hmmm your mi at
I wouldn't stop playing the game altogether if this happened, but it is an issue that's happened to me. Sometimes it doesn't even show my friends are playing when they are.

I recently bought the game because my friends were playing it. This happened a lot of times but I was still able to join my friend's server back then. Now for the past 3 days I haven't been able to join any friend's server AT ALL. There's no solution on the internet that I haven't tried and it still doesn't work. I am not going to buy a Realm subscription if this is Microsoft's way of egging people to buy it. We are 3 friends that play this game. We're students. We don't have the luxury to buy subscriptions. And now I've played it for about a week that I can't even refund it. If I had known this was a persisting problem I'd have rather bought the Java edition. At least that version is better in every matter for solo players

Same, There isn't anything on those forums i haven't tried so I've just given up. And for me the reason i wouldn't waste my time on Realms despite how tempting it is is because  we are close by and normally play lan parties anyway so there would be no point in realms. If anyone manages to find a solution or contacted the devs please give a solution or an update (let us know what they said, are they gonna fix it?) or something.
This has hapind to me to try restarting the game, check if you are loged in or check if you are on the most recent verson.
Asow I done`t think Microsoft can fiks this
THANK GOD SOMEONE HAS A SAME PROBLEM AS ME
Mojang need to bring back the skin import offline so other bedrock players can change and import their skin offline I hope they fix this issue
me gusta la idea Porque lo falta muchos comando que tiene java y me gustaria que añadir tutoriales para los comandos
